description:
There is something hot about objectifying a cute little coed’s ass and pussy while ignoring her identity and autonomy.

To us she is just sex. Her existence is the sum total of those succulent and delicious nubile parts: shaved cunt, round ass, sexy legs, pretty feet, perky breasts and nipples. Because really, who cares about the face and head? That area just makes noise. For the most part, it’s simply annoying.

Foot caning, pussy flogging, and most importantly orgasm torment make up this shoot. We make this little slut cum and cum and cum. She has no idea what we are going to do, or how long we are going to do it. She just endures while the detached half makes a lot of noise.
title: Katie Summers Detached
